attributes.action: ensure the holocaust remains a part of our childrens schooling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that a few school teachers have taken it upon themselves to stop teaching children about the holocaust. Quite simply this is not acceptable. Millions of people were murdered and many more people died fighting to stop the holocaust from continuing and to attempt to ignore this is a major disgrace. I thought we lived in a democratic society where amongst other things we had the right to learn. History is a major part of what makes us the nation we are today and to fail to teach our children such a major event smakes of censorship. If anyone is offended by this...leave the country..there is nothing forcing you to live here...
